items.comment: A wild psychological journey through loss and grief. Compelling characters and premise keep you on the edge of your seat.

One of the best movie going experiences of my life! I was drawn in by every performance and couldn't believe how compelling the story was. The plot was so engaging and unexpected! Scott Duenas killed it!

Really nice to see a grounded thriller like this. They did a really good job of executing the surprise at the end. If you like movies that make you go "holy moly, I didn't see that coming!" then this is definitely rewarding. Super solid performances throughout the whole film. And super legit flick as it had that guy from the Saw movies. Super cool. Def worth watching.

ReBroken is a movie of you want to watch closely and even want to rewatch it to puzzle all the pieces together. Very good acting with a well written story by  Kipp Tribble and Scott Hamm Duenas that has a cool crazy twist at the end.
Great flick! keeps you on your toes, must see!
Loved it! It'll keep you on the edge of your seat.
Great movie lead actor kills it ..
It was a well done indie film. Loved the ending. I recommend it.
